flag provided but not defined: -proxy-port-offset
Usage of init:
  -agents string
    	Comma-separated list of agents to include (claude,gemini,codex,aider,goose,opencode) or 'all'
  -apt-get-install string
    	Additional packages to install via apt-get (comma-separated)
  -copy-home-paths string
    	Comma-separated paths relative to $HOME to copy into container home
  -email string
    	Email for Let's Encrypt certificate expiry notifications (required for letsencrypt)
  -exclude-agents string
    	Comma-separated list of agents to exclude
  -npm-install string
    	Additional packages to install via npm (comma-separated)
  -preview-ports string
    	App preview port range (e.g., 3000-3019) (default "3000-3019")
  -previous-init-flags string
    	How to handle existing init config: 'reuse' or 'ignore'
  -project-directory string
    	Project directory to initialize (default ".")
  -repos-dir string
    	Host directory to mount at /repos for external repo clones (default: .swe-swe/repos in project)
  -ssl string
    	SSL mode: 'no', 'selfsign', 'selfsign@hostname', 'letsencrypt@domain', 'letsencrypt-staging@domain' (default "no")
  -status-bar-font-family string
    	Status bar font family (default "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif")
  -status-bar-font-size int
    	Status bar font size in pixels (default 12)
  -terminal-font-family string
    	Terminal font family (default "Menlo, Monaco, \"Courier New\", monospace")
  -terminal-font-size int
    	Terminal font size in pixels (default 14)
  -with-docker
    	Mount Docker socket to allow container to run Docker commands on host
  -with-slash-commands string
    	Git repos to clone as slash commands (space-separated, format: [alias@]<git-url>)
